1.name: if
1.base: {if $color eq 'green'} An {$fruit} is {$color} @else@ Not a green fruit {/if}
1.pad: {if $color eq 'green'} An {$fruit} is {$color} @else@ Not a green fruit {/if}

0.base: {if $fruit eq 'banana'} {if $color eq 'pink'} A pink banana @else@ Not a pink banana {/if} @else@ {if $color eq 'green'} An
0.pad: {if $fruit eq 'banana'} {if $color eq 'pink'} A pink banana @else@ Not a pink banana {/if} @else@ {if $color eq 'green'} An
